pages.text: $(li)Bucket is a item that can be used to contain different liquids and even some creatures inside of them.

$(li)You can save Water, Lava and Milk in its interior.$(br)$(li)To use a Bucket, just right click pointing in the specific liquid while you are holding an Empty Bucket on your hand.$(br)$(li)Depending of the liquid, you will obtain a Bucket of Milk, Bucket of Lava, or Bucket of Water.

$(li)Slimes and Bats can be saved inside of a Empty bucket.$(br)$(li)To do this you need hold the Bucket on your hand and right click to one of those creatures to save it in its interior.$(br)$(li)Then you can release it following the same process.
